results.raw_content:
HTP Optoelectronics Technology Co.,Ltd
Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing
About us
We are the NO.1 projector manufacturer in China.Our main products are LCD,LED,3D LCD projectors and portable mini projector,game projector.Also we are developing DLP projectos and will come out in short time.Compare to other suppliers we have good quality products and very competetive prices!
We have one owned large factory in Suzhou with more than 30000 square meters and 200 employees.We have our own tooling workshop to develop good casing for customers and we even have our own SMT production line.Also we have very professional QC process,fast delivery and best after sell support.And we can provide OEM services to meet different customer`s requirements.(like design new giftbox,printing,manual even develop new casing).That`s how we ensure the good quality of our products and win customer`s trust.
PLs visit www.htp.com.cn
Business email: diego@htp.com.cn

results.title: HTP (Suzhou) Optoelectronics Technology Co.,LTD - IFA Berlin 2023
results.content: Founded in 1992, HTP Optoelectronic Technology Group is a high-tech enterprise specializing in the R&D, production,sales and service of projectors. HTP Optoelectronic Technology Group owns two production bases located in Jiangxi and Suzhou, three Sales office located in Shanghai, Shenzhen and Chengdu China.
results.raw_content:
​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​
Exhibitors
HTP(Suzhou) Optoelectronics Technology Co.,LTD
Founded in 1992, HTP Optoelectronic Technology Group is a high-tech enterprise specializing in the R&D, production,sales and service of projectors. HTP Optoelectronic Technology Group owns two production bases located in Jiangxi and Suzhou, three Sales office located in Shanghai, Shenzhen and Chengdu China.
HTP focus on projectors for above 20 years. The company insists on R&D first, and attaches importance to intellectual property rights. Basing on 3LCD, OLP, single LCD technology, HTP has obtained s invention patents,more than 100 utility model and appearance patents in the fields of projection optics,structural design and electronic software and hardware.
HTP projectors has passed CCC,CE, CB,FCC,RoHS and other certifications. The brand HTP is well­known in Suzhou city. HTP projectors are widely praised by domestic consumers. Also they are exported to Europe,America,lndia,Brazil, South Africa and other countries, which become a complete agent distribution network worldwide.
HTP Jiangxi Optoelectronic Industrial Park covers an area of 12 acres, with a floor area of one million square feet. In the park, HTP established Optical lens,plastic injection,SMT, projector assembling workshops,which ensure an annual output of 1 million projectors.
"Producing good projector by Chinese technology" is the development mission of HTP, and the company is striding towards the goal of "providing consumers with cost-effective home theater projectors".
Contact Exhibitor

results.title: HTP (Suzhou) Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd.
results.content: Leading supplier of DLP MiniProjector & LEDprojector from Shanghai Shanghai China. View profile, contact info, product catalog & credit report of HTP (Suzhou) Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd.
results.raw_content:
HTP (Suzhou) Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd.
HTP (Suzhou) Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. was built in 2008, our original company name is Hongtianpao(Guangzhou) Digital Electronics Factory which was built in 1992. With the rise in production, we built a gardon style factory in Suzhou Yangcheng technology industrial park which is near from Shanghai, occupies 30000 square meters. We are a professional projector manufacturer, and is the largest one in mainland China. Our products include LCD projector, LED projector, 3D LCD projector, portable mini projector, game projector, DLP projector, etc. Our goal is to bring projector to every family and make each people enjoy the perfect visual feeling of large screen.
Our company has passed CE, FCC and ISO9001:2008 certifications. There are 12 branch workshops include mold creation, lacquer spraying, lens film coating, LED lamp making, electronics board mounting, plastic injection, screen printing and machine assembly. Basically all procedures in making projectors are done in our own company, so quality can be guaranteed, cost can be cntrolled. Through more than 20 years of development, HTP accumulated rich experience on quality control, and formed our unique spirit, culture and philosophy. We pays much attention to new product developing, and is introducing the newest technology into projection to provide customers superior models.
"High quality, Best service" is our spirit. "Old Brand, New concept" is our principle.
Welcome to visit us!
